body:
Comment 2 by **amdragon**: 
[My email reply didn't appear to make it into the issue]

I'll take a stab at it, though it'll probably have to wait until Monday, since we're 
busy wrapping up 6.828.  Since I haven't wrapped my head around the new semicolon 
rule, could you generate some test cases?  I'm particularly unaware of corner cases.
